subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project intends to achieve two objectives: 1) To enhance national capacities to generate and use good quality, gender disaggregated data for better planning, monitoring and assessing the country’s distance to/from the Millennium Development Goal targets. 2) To strengthen capacities of UNDP-pilot districts to foster meaningful participatory local government and support achieving the Millennium Development Goals.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Achievement of MDGs

title: Monitoring the achievement of the MDGs.
